firstStep.title: Who is affected?*
firstStep.disclaimer: If you are filling out the reporting form on behalf of another person, this means that you are filling out the form from the perspective of the affected person and according to their self-reported information. If this is not the case and you would like to describe an incident from your perspective as a witness, please select the option 'Another person' above.

options.name: identity
options.label: Reporting on behalf of the affected person
options.value: Reporting on behalf of the affected person

secondStep.titleMyself: What kind of organization/institution is affected (multiple answers possible)?
secondStep.titleOnbehalf: What is the gender identity of the person concerned?
secondStep.titleOrganization: What kind of organization/institution is affected (multiple answers possible)?

thirdStep.title: How old are you
thirdStep.title1: How old is the person concerned?
thirdStep.title2: How many people are working in the organization/institution (full-time or part-time, or on a freelance basis)?

options.inputPlaceholder: Please describe the incident as precisely as possible.
options.firstList: Where did the discrimination take place?
options.fifthList: What makes you think it was anti-Muslim racism?
options.sixthList: What were the effects of the incident on you (e.g. emotional, physical, social, or financial)?
options.note: *For data protection reasons, please do not provide the names of other individuals here.

seventhStep.title: Did any of these characteristics have an influence on the discrimination?

eightStep.title: Is this another form of discrimination?*

ninthStep.title: Have you already taken other measures?*

optionYesIndeed.name: haveYouReportedYes
optionYesIndeed.label: I have reported the case to the police
optionYesIndeed.value: I have reported the case to the police

optionYesIndeed.name: haveYouReportedYes
optionYesIndeed.label: I have visited a counseling center
optionYesIndeed.value: I have visited a counseling center

optionYesIndeed.name: haveYouReportedYes
optionYesIndeed.label: I have reported the case to another reporting office, namely:
optionYesIndeed.value: I have reported the case to another reporting office, namely:

tenthStep.title: Review the Accuracy of Your Information

cancelModal.title: Are you sure you want to discard your report?
cancelModal.paragraph1: If you cancel the report, all your data will be automatically deleted.
cancelModal.paragraph2: If you are unsure or have any questions, please contact us and we will be happy to help you.

confirmModal.title: Thank You!
confirmModal.des: Thank you for sharing your experiences with us. By filling out the reporting form, you are helping to make discrimination and violence more visible.

onBehalf.title: Attention
onBehalf.des: I hereby confirm that I have entered the information on behalf of the affected person. I have filled out this reporting form on behalf of the affected person and have their consent. All information has been filled out according to the wishes and statements of the affected person.

witness.title: Attention
witness.des: If you are filling out the report form on behalf of someone else, this means that you are filling out the form from the perspective of the person concerned and according to their self-disclosure. If this is not the case and you want to describe an incident from your perspective as a witness, please click the option 'Another person' above.

cookiesConsent.title: Your Privacy
cookiesConsent.content: For the operation of our portal, we exclusively use cookies that are necessary for operation. More detailed information can be found in the
